text:
Created attachment 30037
junitreport Ignore Test Patch

Since Ant 1.9.0, the JUnit task has reported skipped tests - those marked with either @Ignore or throwing AssumptionFailedException. The junitreport task handles this new output without issues, but reports skipped tests as succeeded.

The attached patch changes the junitreport's XSLT files to report skipped tests in the output HTML files as Skipped, with the skip reason if the test provided one.
